attributes.action: ensure that bloggers remain free to comment on government policy, ministerial decisions, political correctness, Islamic extremists, the weather and anything else that takes our fancy, without fear of censorship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In November of last year the Press Complaints Commission called for a voluntary code of conduct covering blogs. This would undoubtedly be the first in a number of measures designed to control the free flow of information, ideas and grassroots campaigns of which the blogging community has become so adept at.
